nodes.text: An outpost of the Galactic Empire was located on Jomark. When the Imperial corvette Carrion Spike was stolen and attacked Galidraan Station, Moff Wilhuff Tarkin requested a list of all nearby Imperial resources the ship might next attack; Jomark and its outpost were amongst those included in the list given to him.
The outpost was first featured in the 2014 novel Tarkin by James Luceno.
